languages.text: "Можно я тоже гляну?" {n}Энрих берет записку аккуратно, чтобы не уронить на нее пепел с папиросы.{/n} "Нужно больше... Больше чего? Автор явно не хочет, чтобы непричастные его поняли. Переписка через тайник — надежный метод скрываться от блюстителей, некоторые рабочие так добывают дурман и вещи, которые не положены им по уставу. Где-то должен быть еще один тайник — в переписке через тайник товар никогда не кладут туда же, куда сообщение — слишком опасно". {n}Деловито посмотрев на вас, Энрих разводит руками.{/n} "Что? Клянусь, что никогда таким не пользовался. Просто... слышал".

"Mind if I take a look?" {n}Einrich takes the note, careful not to let any ash fall on it.{/n} "'Need more'... More what? Whoever wrote it, they didn't want anyone who wasn't in the know to understand. Using caches to exchange messages is a good way to keep things hidden from the enforcers. It's how some workers procure intoxicants and other items they're not supposed to have. There has to be another cache somewhere nearby. You never use the same one for both the transfer and the correspondence — too risky." {n}He gives you a look and shrugs.{/n} "What? I've never engaged in such business, I swear. I've just... heard how it's done."
languages.original_text: "Можно я тоже гляну?" {n}Энрих берет записку аккуратно, чтобы не уронить на нее пепел с папиросы.{/n} "Нужно больше... Больше чего? Автор явно не хочет, чтобы непричастные его поняли. Переписка через тайник — надежный метод скрываться от блюстителей, некоторые рабочие так добывают дурман и вещи, которые не положены им по уставу. Где-то должен быть еще один тайник — в переписке через тайник товар никогда не кладут туда же, куда сообщение — слишком опасно". {n}Деловито посмотрев на вас, Энрих разводит руками.{/n} "Что? Клянусь, что никогда таким не пользовался. Просто... слышал".

It's how some workers procure intoxicants and other items they're not supposed to have. There has to be another cache somewhere nearby. You never use the same one for both the transfer and the correspondence — too risky." {n}He gives you a look and shrugs.{/n} "What? I've never engaged in such business, I swear. languages.text: «¿Le importa que le eche un vistazo?». {n}Einrich coge la nota, con cuidado de no dejar que le caiga ceniza.{/n} «"Necesitamos más"... ¿Más qué? Quien la escribiera, no quería que la entendiera nadie que no estuviese ya al tanto. Usar escondrijos para comunicarse es una buena forma de mantener la información oculta a los guardias. Así se hacen con alcohol y otras cosas no permitidas algunos trabajadores. Tiene que haber otro cerca. Nunca se usa el mismo para la transferencia y la correspondencia, para minimizar riesgos». {n}Te mira y se encoge de hombros.{/n} «¿Qué? Yo nunca he hecho nada por el estilo, lo juro. Solo... me han contado cómo se hace».
languages.original_text: "Mind if I take a look?" {n}Einrich takes the note, careful not to let any ash fall on it.{/n} "'Need more'... More what? Whoever wrote it, they didn't want anyone who wasn't in the know to understand. Using caches to exchange messages is a good way to keep things hidden from the enforcers. It's how some workers procure intoxicants and other items they're not supposed to have. There has to be another cache somewhere nearby. You never use the same one for both the transfer and the correspondence — too risky." {n}He gives you a look and shrugs.{/n} "What? I've never engaged in such business, I swear. I've just... heard how it's done."

Quien la escribiera, no quería que la entendiera nadie que no estuviese ya al tanto. Usar escondrijos para comunicarse es una buena forma de mantener la información oculta a los guardias. Así se hacen con alcohol y otras cosas no permitidas algunos trabajadores. Tiene que haber otro cerca. Nunca se usa el mismo para la transferencia y la correspondencia, para minimizar riesgos». {n}Te mira y se encoge de hombros.{/n} «¿Qué? Yo nunca he hecho nada por el estilo, lo juro. Solo... me han contado cómo se hace».

languages.text: 「見てみてもよろしいですか？」{n}アインリッヒは、灰が落ちないように気を付けながらメモを受け取る。{/n}「まだ送って欲しい…何をでしょう？誰が書いたにせよ、内輪の話にしたいのでしょう。メッセージのやりとりに隠し場所を使えば、うまくエンフォーサーにバレずにコソコソできますからね。一部の労働者は、そうやって中毒品や禁止製品を調達しています。近くに別の隠し場所があるはずですよ。配達とやりとりに同じ場所を使うことはまずない…リスクが高すぎます」{n} 男はこちらを見て肩をすくめた。{/n}「えっ？誓って、そんな取引はしたことありませんよ。ただ…やり方を聞いたことがあるだけです」
languages.original_text: "Mind if I take a look?" {n}Einrich takes the note, careful not to let any ash fall on it.{/n} "'Need more'... More what? Whoever wrote it, they didn't want anyone who wasn't in the know to understand. Using caches to exchange messages is a good way to keep things hidden from the enforcers. It's how some workers procure intoxicants and other items they're not supposed to have. There has to be another cache somewhere nearby. You never use the same one for both the transfer and the correspondence — too risky." {n}He gives you a look and shrugs.{/n} "What? I've never engaged in such business, I swear. I've just... heard how it's done."

traits.locale_text: 「見てみてもよろしいですか？」{n}アインリッヒは、灰が落ちないように気を付けながらメモを受け取る。{/n}「まだ送って欲しい…何をでしょう？誰が書いたにせよ、内輪の話にしたいのでしょう。メッセージのやりとりに隠し場所を使えば、うまくエンフォーサーにバレずにコソコソできますからね。一部の労働者は、そうやって中毒品や禁止製品を調達しています。近くに別の隠し場所があるはずですよ。配達とやりとりに同じ場所を使うことはまずない…リスクが高すぎます」{n} 男はこちらを見て肩をすくめた。{/n}「えっ？誓って、そんな取引はしたことありませんよ。ただ…やり方を聞いたことがあるだけです」

languages.text: “可以让我看一眼吗？”{n}艾因里奇小心翼翼拿着字条，不让烟灰落在上面。{/n}“‘需要更多’……需要更多什么？虽然不知道是谁写的，但写字条的人肯定不希望其他人看懂。通过藏匿处来交换情报是个行之有效的方法，可以瞒过执法者的视线。有的工人就是通过这种方式来购买违禁药物，或是其他违禁物品。这附近肯定还有其他藏匿处，因为用来通信和用来交易的藏匿处肯定不会是同一个，不然风险太大了。”{n}他看了你一眼，耸了耸肩。{/n}“怎么了？我敢发誓，我从来没干过这种事情。我都是……从别人那里听说的。”
languages.original_text: "Mind if I take a look?" {n}Einrich takes the note, careful not to let any ash fall on it.{/n} "'Need more'... More what? Whoever wrote it, they didn't want anyone who wasn't in the know to understand. Using caches to exchange messages is a good way to keep things hidden from the enforcers. It's how some workers procure intoxicants and other items they're not supposed to have. There has to be another cache somewhere nearby. You never use the same one for both the transfer and the correspondence — too risky." {n}He gives you a look and shrugs.{/n} "What? I've never engaged in such business, I swear. I've just... heard how it's done."

traits.locale_text: “可以让我看一眼吗？”{n}艾因里奇小心翼翼拿着字条，不让烟灰落在上面。{/n}“‘需要更多’……需要更多什么？虽然不知道是谁写的，但写字条的人肯定不希望其他人看懂。通过藏匿处来交换情报是个行之有效的方法，可以瞒过执法者的视线。有的工人就是通过这种方式来购买违禁药物，或是其他违禁物品。这附近肯定还有其他藏匿处，因为用来通信和用来交易的藏匿处肯定不会是同一个，不然风险太大了。”{n}他看了你一眼，耸了耸肩。{/n}“怎么了？我敢发誓，我从来没干过这种事情。我都是……从别人那里听说的。”

languages.text: "Darf ich mal sehen?" {n}Einrich nimmt die Nachricht an sich, wobei er sich bemüht, keine Asche darauffallen zu lassen.{/n} "'Ich brauche mehr' ... Mehr was? Wer auch immer das geschrieben hat, wollte nicht, dass Außenstehende es verstehen. Über Verstecke Nachrichten auszutauschen, ist eine gute Methode, Dinge vor den Enforcern zu verbergen. Manche Arbeiter beschaffen auf diese Weise Rauschmittel und andere Dinge, die sie eigentlich nicht besitzen sollten. Es muss irgendwo in der Nähe noch ein Versteck geben. Man verwendet nie dasselbe für den Transfer und die Korrespondenz. Zu riskant." {n}Er sieht dich an und zuckt mit den Schultern.{/n} "Was? Ich war nie in so etwas verwickelt, das schwöre ich. Ich habe nur ... gehört, wie man das macht."
languages.original_text: "Mind if I take a look?" {n}Einrich takes the note, careful not to let any ash fall on it.{/n} "'Need more'... More what? Whoever wrote it, they didn't want anyone who wasn't in the know to understand. Using caches to exchange messages is a good way to keep things hidden from the enforcers. It's how some workers procure intoxicants and other items they're not supposed to have. There has to be another cache somewhere nearby. You never use the same one for both the transfer and the correspondence — too risky." {n}He gives you a look and shrugs.{/n} "What? I've never engaged in such business, I swear. I've just... heard how it's done."

traits.locale_text: "Darf ich mal sehen?" {n}Einrich nimmt die Nachricht an sich, wobei er sich bemüht, keine Asche darauffallen zu lassen.{/n} "'Ich brauche mehr' ... Mehr was? Wer auch immer das geschrieben hat, wollte nicht, dass Außenstehende es verstehen. Über Verstecke Nachrichten auszutauschen, ist eine gute Methode, Dinge vor den Enforcern zu verbergen. Manche Arbeiter beschaffen auf diese Weise Rauschmittel und andere Dinge, die sie eigentlich nicht besitzen sollten. Es muss irgendwo in der Nähe noch ein Versteck geben. Man verwendet nie dasselbe für den Transfer und die Korrespondenz. Zu riskant." {n}Er sieht dich an und zuckt mit den Schultern.{/n} "Was? Ich war nie in so etwas verwickelt, das schwöre ich. Ich habe nur ... gehört, wie man das macht."

languages.text: « Permettez que je jette un coup d'œil ? » {n}Einrich se saisit du message en prenant soin de ne pas faire tomber de cendre dessus.{/n} « "Il en faut plus"... Plus de quoi ? Quel qu'en soit l'auteur, il ne voulait pas courir le risque que son secret s'ébruite. Se servir de caches pour communiquer est un bon moyen d'échapper à la vigilance des prévôts. C'est ainsi que certains ouvriers se procurent des stupéfiants et d'autres objets qu'ils ne sont pas censés détenir. Il y a forcément une autre planque quelque part dans les parages. On n'utilise jamais la même pour les messages et la marchandise... trop risqué. » {n}Il vous adresse un regard et hausse les épaules.{/n} « Inutile de me regarder comme ça. Je vous assure que je ne me suis jamais livré à ce genre de transactions. J'en ai juste... entendu parler. »
languages.original_text: "Mind if I take a look?" {n}Einrich takes the note, careful not to let any ash fall on it.{/n} "'Need more'... More what? Whoever wrote it, they didn't want anyone who wasn't in the know to understand. Using caches to exchange messages is a good way to keep things hidden from the enforcers. It's how some workers procure intoxicants and other items they're not supposed to have. There has to be another cache somewhere nearby. You never use the same one for both the transfer and the correspondence — too risky." {n}He gives you a look and shrugs.{/n} "What? I've never engaged in such business, I swear. I've just... heard how it's done."

traits.locale_text: « Permettez que je jette un coup d'œil ? » {n}Einrich se saisit du message en prenant soin de ne pas faire tomber de cendre dessus.{/n} « "Il en faut plus"... Plus de quoi ? Quel qu'en soit l'auteur, il ne voulait pas courir le risque que son secret s'ébruite. Se servir de caches pour communiquer est un bon moyen d'échapper à la vigilance des prévôts. C'est ainsi que certains ouvriers se procurent des stupéfiants et d'autres objets qu'ils ne sont pas censés détenir. Il y a forcément une autre planque quelque part dans les parages. On n'utilise jamais la même pour les messages et la marchandise... trop risqué. » {n}Il vous adresse un regard et hausse les épaules.{/n} « Inutile de me regarder comme ça. Je vous assure que je ne me suis jamais livré à ce genre de transactions. J'en ai juste... entendu parler. »

languages.text: "Ben de bakabilir miyim?" {n}Einrich, üzerine kül düşmemesine dikkat ederek notu alıyor.{/n} "'Daha fazla gerek'... Daha fazla ne gerek? Bu notu her kim yazdıysa bilgisi olmayanların anlamasını istememiş. Mesajları zulalarla göndermek, yapılanları infazcılardan saklamak için iyi bir yol. Bazı işçiler de hakları olmayan içkileri ve diğer eşyaları böyle buluyor. Yakınında bir yerlerde başka bir zula daha olmalı. Hem nakliyat hem de yazışma için aynı zulayı asla kullanmazlar. Öylesi çok riskli." {n}Sana bir bakış atarak omuz silkiyor.{/n} "Ne oldu? Böylesi hadiselere hiç bulaşmadım, yemin ediyorum. Ben sadece... Nasıl yapıldığını işitmiştim."
languages.original_text: "Mind if I take a look?" {n}Einrich takes the note, careful not to let any ash fall on it.{/n} "'Need more'... More what? Whoever wrote it, they didn't want anyone who wasn't in the know to understand. Using caches to exchange messages is a good way to keep things hidden from the enforcers. It's how some workers procure intoxicants and other items they're not supposed to have. There has to be another cache somewhere nearby. You never use the same one for both the transfer and the correspondence — too risky." {n}He gives you a look and shrugs.{/n} "What? I've never engaged in such business, I swear. I've just... heard how it's done."
